review: I would like to recommend Dr.Arun Raj as he was extremely friendly and also I was too scared of the tooth extraction earlier but the way he and the other staff carried the whole process, Everything went smoothly,the whole process was not at all painful.Thanks to the doctor and staff of Tooth Shine

****** *** **** *** treated me well . Bakya lakshmi made my day. She explained everything to me and treated my tooth issue.. Must recommended..

Kudos to doctor
